Dear God, can't you people separate your personal, anecdotal experiences, from the aggregate data that is accumulated by the studies. Have you not heard the phrase """"exception to the rule."""" I'm glad your formula fed baby is smart, but that doesn't negate the conclusions drawn from the study. The inability to recognize this is incredibly self centered and reflects a serious lack of critical thinking ability.

Yeah the hate is horrible! I can't believe it is 2016. 75 years ago WW2 Resurgence of close mindedness is so scary. I grieve for people at most risk of abuse & harassment. It is the best of times and the worst of times it seems. Keep you & yours safe and happy.

Our president should tell these BLM rioters to go home already- they are disturbing the peace of our country. We have real problems to deal with - like Homeland Security. Look what's happening in the world - ISIS is terrorizing every nation! Their racial issues are on them at this point. They haven't the facts to even back them up. They have blood on their hands! They should be arrested by the hundred at this point, not applauded or appeased. Here are some facts: An African-American Harvard Economist, Roland G. Frye, Jr., just published findings that there is no racial differences between the deadly shootings of whites and blacks by law enforcement in America. He began his study because he was angered by black men being shot by white cops. But his study surprisingly found that police officers use deadly force when they perceive a threat, regardless of skin color. This data undercuts the entire BLM's argument. He summarized by stating """"Yes, there are some instances of criminal acts, but they are far and in between,"""" and """"they are not disproportionate by race.""""

Eric, its not necessarily the fact that this child is praying to God that restores faith in humanity. Its about the selfless actions of this little boy, who chose to ask for a miracle for someone else instead of a toy for himself. Even those who don't believe in God, or have a different god can appreciate this selfless act and see it as having faith in humanity.
Jodi Aristea Kaltenbach Jennifer Kaltenbach
